About CAPM: Certified Associate in Project Management (CAPM)?, is a certification provided by PMI, canad for the people who are new to the project management domain or having lesser years of experience in projects.  Whether you are new to project management, or already serving as a subject matter expert on project teams, the CAPM can get your career on the right path or take it to the next level.
